name: 100 Mile House
description:
100 Mile House

You are a Police Officer patrolling a small county in the Pacific Northwest when you receive a call from a concerned neighbour about screams and strange looking people shuffling around the 100 Mile House property.

The house is owned by an eccentric guru who is rumored to be operating a cult that worships unknown deities. There has always been talk of strange occurences, but this time seems different...

Instructions

Rescue as many hostages as you can before you run out of ammo. When you cannot rescue any more, run back to where you first started indicated by the green light.

W     - Walk forward
S      - Walk backward
A      - Strafe left
D      - Strafe right
F       - Use/Open door
R       - Reload weapon
Shift  - Run
LMB   - Fire
RMB   - Look down sights
